version_description:
New message from captain's bridge!
- The journey continues! Our cruise itinerary included: Cape Town, Manila, Cannes, Dubai and Deauville
- Not a single coin passed: all your level accumulations will now be safely stored and multiplied in the accumulation safe.
- Faster to new cities: betting not only increases the reward, but also the stars!
- Minor improvements and bugfixes.
Welcome on board!

- Olly olly oxen free! Find the JACKPOT card to get really HUGE pile of coins!
- Starfall! Now you'll get a star for EVERY streak you've made. And remember, you always have a chance to double and triple your winnings with our "betting" option.
- Let everything shine 'cause we're continuing game polishing at full tilt.
- Bugfixes: some rare species are found and sent to our collection.

- Hurry and update the game! You'll get a reward for updating to this version of the game and all future versions!
- You can now contact the Support Team directly from the Settings menu.
- We've added lots of new sounds and music. Make sure you play with sound on!
- Some animations have been improved and some new ones have been added.
- Bug fixes: we discovered some particularly rare bugs and added them to our collection.

We’ve added 80 awesome levels!
Even more in-game events - don't miss Halloween! Discover a new game design and a special event.
We start the first season of Nassau adventures in November! Complete daily and weekly quests during the month to earn rewards.
Break the piggy bank to make sure you don’t miss your chance to earn bonus coins.
Join our community on Facebook.
We’ve added more animations and music themes. Turn up the volume on your smartphone and enjoy!
We’ve fixed the bugs.

- 80 new levels.
- Increase your league by winning in the tournament and competing with the best players.
- New card tournament! Collect cards, win solitaire and compete with other players.
- Get gifts from David for making in-game purchases.
- Use boosters to get more rewards and progress through the game more quickly.
- Get milestone prizes for progress in different worlds.
- Added new sounds, music and animations.
- Fixed small bugs.
- More news in our Facebook community.

- Play 80 new levels.
- Get more presents for completing levels in our special Christmas event!
- Use boosters to help you earn more gold and open up new worlds.
- Get to grips with the latest updates in-game – there's a new section in settings!
- Check out our new theme music and animations.
- Join our groups on social media!
- And, we've fixed some minor bugs.

- Play 80 new levels.
- Get more presents for completing levels in our special Christmas event!
- Use boosters to help you earn more gold and open up new worlds.
- Get to grips with the latest updates in-game – there's a new section in settings!
- Check out our new theme music and animations.
- Join our groups on social media!
- And, we've fixed some minor bugs.

- Play 80 new levels.
- Get more presents for completing levels in our special Christmas event!
- Use boosters to help you earn more gold and open up new worlds.
- Get to grips with the latest updates in-game – there's a new section in settings!
- Check out our new theme music and animations.
- Join our groups on social media!
- And, we've fixed some minor bugs.

- Play 80 new levels.
- Cook up real culinary masterpieces in the new event and compete for the title of Best Team.
- Season Pass: Complete new tasks, earn even more rewards and have the chance to become the season's best player.
- Go to the new location Solitaire Reef while you wait to go to new countries!
- Check out the new sounds, music and animations.
- Minor bugs have been fixed.

- Check out the new sounds, music and animations.
- Minor bugs have been fixed.

- The game is now a lot more stable! We've worked hard on tech upgrades and optimization.
- We've improved the animation and mechanics in slot machine and dice tournaments.
- Tell the support team about issues in the in-game settings. We're always happy to help
- Subscribe to our pages on social media. Take part in competitions and stay up-to-date with the latest news!

- The game is now a lot more stable! We've worked hard on tech upgrades and optimization.
- We've improved the animation and mechanics in slot machine and dice tournaments.
- Tell the support team about issues in the in-game settings. We're always happy to help
- Subscribe to our pages on social media. Take part in competitions and stay up-to-date with the latest news!

- Play 80 new levels.
- New locations – Rio de Janeiro and Chichen Itza.
- New slot machine! Compete with players and play some spins to win the Jackpot! Use auto-spin!
- Place high bets in tournaments!
- In the new dice tournament there are now more squares and mechanics on the board.
- Personalize your game using avatars and custom nicknames in the Settings.
- New sounds, music and animations added.
- Minor bugs fixed.

- Play 80 new levels.
- New locations – Rio de Janeiro and Chichen Itza.
- New slot machine! Compete with players and play some spins to win the Jackpot! Use auto-spin!
- Place high bets in tournaments!
- In the new dice tournament there are now more squares and mechanics on the board.
- Personalize your game using avatars and custom nicknames in the Settings.
- New sounds, music and animations added.
- Minor bugs fixed.

- Play 80 new levels.
- Visit new locations: Amsterdam and Havana.
- Place higher bets! Levels now have new multipliers: x5 and x10.
- New seasons are now available—get ready to set sail!
- Added new sounds, music, and animations.
- Small bug fixes.

- Play 80 new levels.
- Set sail for a new location – the capital of Italy.
- New avatars in rewards!
- New seasons and events are already in the game. Coming soon!
- New sounds, music and animations added.
- Home screen updated.
- Minor bugs fixed.

Subscribe to our groups on social media!
